1.3.name: wordpress/rootables
1.3.description: Root.abl.es is an expert community for programmers, developers and system administrators. Get feedback on your hacks, find answers to your tricky questions and learn to administer your Mac, Linux or Win system! This plugin allows you to share top hacks from root.abl.es by tag, votes or views. If you create an account you can even create your own personal shortlist of top tips!
